title: The Ultimate CAPM Exam Prep Guide 5th Edition
features: This PMI CAPM exam Prep guide is the fourth generation exam prep workbook designed to ensure your success when taking the CAPM exam. Just like our globally recognized PMP exam prep guide, this CAPM guide provides all users everything they need to pass the CAPM exam. Following the PMI global standard in project management this guide was meticulously prepared to align with the PMI PMBOK Guide 5th Edition. Each lesson is designed for adult learners and with careful instructional design elements to encourage learning and comprehension.
description: Wes Balakian, PMP is a published author, speaker, mentor, coach, facilitator and courseware designer with more than 25 years of project management and training experience. This is book number six in the project management series and they continue to become best sellers in the project management community. Wes has an advanced masters in project management from George Washington University. He is adjunct professor at the University of Texas Arlington. He also is the CEO of true Solutions Inc. which itself is a Texas state seminar school and college. Wes has along history of management experience, coaching and training for large corporations and non profits. As a leading expert in this field this guide will no doubt become one of the best sellers for then next several years.

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/71b9s5jwlYL._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Wes Balakian', 'about': ['Wes Balakian was born in Malvern, Pennsylvania. Moved to Detroit Michigan at age thirteen and then in 1980 he moved to Dallas, Texas. Wes started his current company True Solutions Inc. in 1999 and has been hard at work delivering the best project management training, consulting and strategic mentoring to global 100 companies and individuals. During this time Wes has developed innovative adult learning products for skilled professionals. He also created some very engaging professional skills classes to support and compliment the many project management training courses that he developed.', 'Over the years the products and programs Wes developed and delivered have matured and become a globally recognized standard in high demand. His posters, books, self study kits and instructor led training has helped thousand achieve their milestone ambition of becoming a PMI PMP or CAPM credential holder.', 'Still living in very far north Dallas with the headquarters office in mid town Dallas, Wes and his team of loyal and dedicated professionals continues to build a world class adult education organization.']}
